alert.note: Alert for Pierce (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dakota, northwestern Goodhue, south central Washington and southwestern Pierce Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Cannon Falls, or 15 miles northeast of Northfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hastings and Prescott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
